google_reviews.author: Graham Armstrong
google_reviews.review:
We rented from Howard and Caroline for 5 years, and while their management style might not work for everyone, it was perfect for us. We were comfortable handling the majority of maintenance and repairs on our own,  and they were comfortable being "hands-off" landlords. We paid a very reasonable price the entire time that we rented from them.

They are also good people. I will miss having small chats with Caroline once a month while turning in rent.

Owners selling property gave me till end of lease to figure out new place to live found place a month early moving out still holding me to lease to pay April rent which is a scummy move been a good renter no problems or drama I crawled under unit checking for leaks they are going to take me to court just plain greedy people

google_reviews.author: Nick Hatch
google_reviews.review:
I've been a tenant with Adams for over three years, and have been pleased with the no-nonsense approach they take with property management. Problems generally get fixed quickly, and they'll be a respectful and attentive landlord as long as you're an attentive tenant.

They have a reputation for being strict, but I've always been a respectful tenant, and am treated with the same respect.

They've never played games with nickel-and-diming security deposits, something many other landlords in Bellingham seem to love to do.

Truthfully Adams is the second worst (Lakeway wins first by a landslide- oi vey). This guy...I've never been so abused by a property management company. Know your renters rights, people! DO NOT let Howard Adams bully you!

summary.text:
Good

There are several instances of positive experiences reported by tenants of Adams Property Management, particularly highlighting the owners, Howard and Caroline. One user reflected on a five-year rental period, expressing satisfaction with the management style, which favored a hands-off approach, allowing tenants to handle many repairs independently. They noted how the pricing was reasonable throughout, demonstrating that some renters appreciate this autonomy and the mutual respect shown during their interactions.

Another tenant emphasized the quick response to issues, praising the no-nonsense attitude of the management. They noted that as long as they were a respectful tenant, they received respect in return. Importantly, this user commented on the positive handling of security deposits, mentioning that they had never experienced any disputes over that aspect, a common concern among renters in the area.

Great

Among the numerous user reviews, a consistent theme of commendation emerges for the integrity and communication skills exhibited by the management. Users highlighted the thorough tenant screening process, which leads to consistent satisfaction with the rental properties. Good communication is repeatedly mentioned as a strong suit for the property management, ensuring that tenant requests are followed through in a timely manner and effectively managed.

Tenants appreciated the integrity shown in their dealings, as reflected in reviews that express gratitude for clear expectations and straightforward agreements. This level of professionalism and care for their properties underscores how some tenants view the management as trustworthy and reliable, counterbalancing the negative experiences shared by others.

Bad

A significant portion of user reviews paints a troubling picture of the maintenance issues experienced by tenants. Complaints surfaced about slow responses to urgent repairs and maintenance, with several users noting that they were often left dealing with urgent issues alone for extended periods. One renter outlined a harrowing experience of going without running water for ten days, indicating negligence on the part of the management team.

Ugly

Some of the most alarming reviews criticize the unprofessional behavior and apparent lack of respect for tenants by the property management. Several users reported feeling verbally abused and bullied, particularly highlighting incidents in which the owners behaved aggressively towards tenants. This behavior reportedly included using derogatory language during disagreements and even visiting properties unannounced, creating an intimidating living environment.
